recipesJson.name: Rollin
recipesJson.author: Deweysuds
recipesJson.description: Buttery caramel roll topped with butter pecans.  At least a week steep.  Had to go with some outside the normal flavor companies to get what I wanted...but is exactly where I want it to be.

reviews.text: This is really nice. Great balance between the caramel and the cinnamon. The only thing for me that didn't make it a 5 star (perfect) mix is I think the butter pecan could be a bit higher. Well done though, it is a pleasure to vape this, very tasty. I think the sugar cone is a perfect addition to this mix.
